title: Travel4rewards
author: Travel4rewards
content: We all are in bitcoin and crypto we got to show strong support together for bitcoin. Nobody don't want to live under the dictatorship rules that's what the CBDC are the greatest wealth are freedom. We the people have power let's share this tweet comment and like we let the world know we want FREEDOM! Get Active guys nobody don't fight for your freedom let's send awarness to all over the world how brave smart she is Sarah Knafo she sactafice for freedom all her own self Comfort and she will fight for freedom that's courage to go against evil WEF and von der lyen when we all unite together then we make our world better.Every little helps !! comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: We are now pushing Bitcoin and Crypto-currency narrative to fit what ever we want, Bitcoin is not a political movement or a radical political society.I will doy research on her more and if she is for good then I wish her well but regardless of good or evil I did not join Crypto-currency to be pushing on political movement or something in that manner.

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Don't think Bitcoin is a Damsel in distress that needs saving or a Hero. For those that were as lost as I was why she was considered a Hero. Link Below. https://www.cryptotimes.io/2024/12/17/eu-mp-sarah-knafo-warns-of-digital-euro-promotes-bitcoin/I don't really care why at least she's pushing for freedom and is opened about the dangers CBDC can pose to citizens freedom. Even if they plan on making something digital they should atleast make it an hedge against inflation But No, that would just reduce their tight reigns on the economy.
